trans-unit.source: Represents a civic address.
trans-unit.target: 表示市政地址。

trans-unit.source: A civic address can include fields such as street address, postal code, state/province, and country or region.
trans-unit.target: 一个市政地址可以包括街道地址、邮政编码、省/直辖市/自治区和国家/地区等字段。

trans-unit.source: A civic address for a location can be obtained from a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> by using a class that implements <xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver>.
trans-unit.target: 可以从获取位置市政地址<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>由使用的类，实现<xref:System.Device.Location.ICivicAddressResolver>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver> class provides a default implementation that returns the civic address that corresponds to a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>, if the location source provides both coordinate data as well as civic address data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver>类提供的默认实现返回对应于市政地址<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>，如果定位源同时提供了坐标数据，以及市政地址数据。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A> returns a <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> for the current location.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A> 返回<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress>当前的位置。

trans-unit.source: If the location source is unable to resolve the coordinate position to a civic address, <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果位置源是无法解析的坐标位置为市政地址<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown>返回。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to resolve a <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> from a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> location synchronously.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何解决<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress>从<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>位置以同步方式。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to resolve a <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> from a <xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate> location asynchronously.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何解决<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress>从<xref:System.Device.Location.GeoCoordinate>位置以异步方式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: All fields are initialized to <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 所有字段都初始化为<xref:System.String.Empty>。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the first line of the street address.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含街道地址第一行的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the second line of the street address.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含街道地址第二行的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the building name or number.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含建筑名称或门牌号的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the city.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含城市的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the country or region.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含国家或地区的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the floor number.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含楼层的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the postal code.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含邮政编码的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A string containing the state or province.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含州或省的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress" /> class using address information.
trans-unit.target: 使用地址信息初始化 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: At least one parameter must be a non-empty string.
trans-unit.target: 至少有一个参数必须为非空字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the first line of the address.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置第一行地址。

trans-unit.source: Returns the first line of the address.
trans-unit.target: 返回第一行地址。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，则返回 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the second line of the address.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置第二行地址。

trans-unit.source: Returns the second line of the address.
trans-unit.target: 返回第二行地址。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <see cref="F:System.String.Empty." />
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，则返回 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty." />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the building name or number.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置大楼名称或楼号。

trans-unit.source: Returns the building name or number.
trans-unit.target: 返回大楼名称或楼号。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，则返回 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the name of the city.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置城市名称。

trans-unit.source: Returns the name of the city.
trans-unit.target: 返回城市名称。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，则返回 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the country or region of the location.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置位置所在的国家/地区。

trans-unit.source: Returns the country or region code.
trans-unit.target: 返回国家/地区代码。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，则返回 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: The country or region is typically represented by a two-letter ISO-3166 country code.
trans-unit.target: 两个字母 ISO 3166 国家/地区代码通常表示的国家或地区。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the floor level of the location.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置位置所在的楼层。

trans-unit.source: Returns a string that contains the floor level.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个字符串，其中包含该楼层。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，则返回 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress" /> contains data.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress" /> 是否包含数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress" /> is equal to <see cref="F:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress" /> 等于 <see cref="F:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.Unknown" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.IsUnknown%2A> to check the <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> that is returned from <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A> before the civic address is printed out.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.IsUnknown%2A>检查<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress>从返回<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A>市政地址打印出来之前。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the postal code of the location.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置位置的邮政编码。

trans-unit.source: Returns the postal code of the location.
trans-unit.target: 返回位置的邮政编码。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，则返回 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the state or province of the location.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置位置所在的省/直辖市/自治区。

trans-unit.source: Returns the state or province of the location.
trans-unit.target: 返回位置所在的省/直辖市/自治区。

trans-unit.source: If the data is not provided, returns <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供数据，则返回 <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />。

trans-unit.source: Represents a <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress" /> that contains no data.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个不包含任何数据的 <see cref="T:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress" />。

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.IsUnknown%2A> to verify whether a <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> contains data.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.IsUnknown%2A>以验证是否<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress>包含数据。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.IsUnknown%2A> to check the <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress> that is returned from <xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A> before the civic address is printed out.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress.IsUnknown%2A>检查<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddress>从返回<xref:System.Device.Location.CivicAddressResolver.ResolveAddress%2A>市政地址打印出来之前。
